name: Senior Cost Engineer / Старший специалист по расчету затрат
description:
KAZ Minerals Russia is looking for potential candidates for the position of Senior Cost Engineer within Project Controls Department in our Moscow office (with subsequent rotation to Chukotka).

Structural division: Project Controls Department

Report to: Lead Cost Engineer

RESPONSIBILITIES:

  • Assist Lead Cost Engineer to provide timely, accurate and relevant cost data for monthly and regular cost reporting;
  • Advise the Senior Cost Engineer and Project team of results of cost data analysis;
  • Responsible for coding of items in contracts and Purchase Orders to ensure correct budget allocation;
  • Maintain and control of the project budget;
  • Liaise with all managers to ascertain costs and schedule impact of trends and changes;
  • Supervision of trend and scope change program;
  • Monitor and maintain the EPCM and management forecasts (if applicable);
  • Supervise regular cost reviews and prepare data for inclusion in the Definitive Estimate;
  • Prepare detailed commitment and cash flows;
  • Maintain PRISM Cost Module system data including the transfer of cost and information from the PRISM Contracts, Procurement and Invoices modules.

REQUIREMENTS:

  • Bachelor Degree in Finance, Engineering, or Construction Management preferred;
  • 7+ years of Project Cost Engineering experience;
  • Experience in all phases of project implementation from feasibility study to commissioning and start-up;
  • Proven capability to undertake all aspects of cost control;
  • Proficient with project controls specialist software and generic database & spreadsheet software – PRISM preferred;
  • Advanced MS Excel user;
  • Languages: English is essential, Russian Fluent.

CONDITIONS:

  • Direct contract with KAZ Minerals Russia LLC;

  • Work schedule: Monday-Friday: from 9 am till 6 pm

  • Competitive salary and benefits;
  • Medical insurance;
  • Corporate lunches;
  • Location: Moscow City
  • Rotation to Chukotka - Q3 2022
